channel.title: Illusion-X is back
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2mfevc.png[/img][/center]
Okay so i do not how to start this off but here it goes.. Okay so " Illusion-X" was my project last year we lasted for like 5-6 months we reached 40+ players daily. Right now i do not have that much time i can not code the server, due to the lack of time. And the website side... the other owner he doesnt not play rsps anymore so he doesnt help me so thats why i need a webdesigner. So ill give you a special rank on my server. and when we get donations... ull get a a bit from them. This server is re-opened and in progress. We are using Insidia-X as our base, (Its PI). So im looking for people
[center][img]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/mod_gold.gif[/img]Server- Staff[img]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/mod_gold.gif[/img]
[img]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/deleteafteriu0.png[/img][u]Owners/Co-Owner[/u][img]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/deleteafteriu0.png[/img] - Mj (owner) - Tom ( Co-Owner)
[IMG]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/admin.gif[/img][u]Admin/mod[/u][IMG]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/admin.gif[/img] - Aad _____________ [b][img]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/modcrownaw2.png[/img]Mod:[img]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/modcrownaw2.png[/img][/b] None atm
Some Media: [IMG]http://img403.imageshack.us/img403/9114/0178.gif[/img] [IMG]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/1122/0169.gif[/img] [IMG]http://img577.imageshack.us/img577/8559/0176.gif[/img] [IMG]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/2905/godwarsi.png[/img] [IMG]http://img692.imageshack.us/img692/8762/warriorguild.png[/img]
[center][img]http://www.applemetrorestaurants.com/sites/default/files/Apply-Here.jpg[/img][/center]
[b] Requirements For Web-Designer[/b] [b]- Know how to use SMF - Are u good at HTML and other codes.: - Do you know How to add basic stuff: - Do youHave time to do it.: - 14+ and up age, are you? :[/b] [b] Requirements For Coder[/b] [b]- Ofc know hot to code - do you know how to make webclients: - in request make update regularly , can you : - respect to owner and other staff: - 14 and up age, are you? : [/b] [b]Admin/Mods[/b] [b]- Can you be nice and respectful? : - Prev. experience in other servers? : - How many hrs a day you can play: - will you be active on forums to?: - 14 and up age, are you? : [/b]
[size=14pt]!!!! PLEASE STATE WHICH POSITION YOUR APPLYING FOR!!!!
add me on skye: nika443 or pm me on here[/size]
[u]THANK YOU, Illusion-X staff![/u]

item.title: Illusion-X is back
item.dc:creator: @_ILLUSION .:ILLUSION:.
item.description:
@_ILLUSION wrote:

Admin/mod either is fine with me

  • Can you be nice and respectful? : yes! Very nice and very respectful
  • Prev. experience in other servers? : I have been admin/mod on many servers including dpkz, paposcape1, realzzz 317, and more
  • How many hrs a day you can play: 2-5 weekdays 2-7 weekends
  • will you be active on forums to?: yessir
  • 14 and up age, are you? : yes I am 15

Please consider me

item.title: Illusion-X is back
item.dc:creator: @santa_skillz santa skillz
item.description:
@santa_skillz wrote:

Staff is just one of the parts in my post. if a mod tells me to remove it i will? i do not see any problem in that? your the one whos making a big deal out of this tiny thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Illusion-X is back
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

santa skillz:

okay does it really matter how i spell? im in a rush, and yes ik its under developtment section but… dont coder/web-designers develop the game? yes they do so please stop posting on my thread, but ty for bump

Technically no.

A real programmer has to

analyze, design, develop, then test.

A website developer would be a person who is functional in all aspects of website design. such as html/php/sql usage/security knowledge.
A java programmer though has to first analyze what there there is then work from that or create entirely from scratch.

Now, on to what you just stated.

Saying you want “staff” is not a development team.

The rules clearly state you have to show something that proves the server development will be a success. The proof has to be something that is different. From the images I saw…all servers out there have it so you really can’t claim that you have developed that. If you HAVE developed it please state WHAT you changed in the code itself, how it was improved/changed, or how it has been made different.

You see where I am getting at by now? I am not being mean about this I am trying to to give you some very good criticism that will get you further on this site. Why do you think your nearly 0 rep already? A real development is formed from something that proves something will come out of this. You have proved 100% nothing and that is why I am about to report this topic and request for it to be closed.

Read full topic

item.title: Illusion-X is back
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

this is not a place to look for staff either. This is DEVELOPMENT TEAMS. DEVELOPMENT

an administrator…administrates.

A moderator… moderates…

Read full topic

item.title: Illusion-X is back
item.dc:creator: @santa_skillz santa skillz
item.description:
@santa_skillz wrote:

Okay im nothing trying to get any one mad here but… If you dont like the offers like the part of donations ( im not saying exact amount cuz the rules say you cant offer money) secondly no im not looking for someone to make forums i got perfectly working forums (not advertsing) www.illusionx.comoj.com,

and no i can code, i can make forums my self. but i got a job after school i get out of school at 4 i work till 9, i stay by pc from 9-10 or 9-2am weekends…

so if you dont like please dont post… I really dont care what you gotta saying im just looking for staff okay? thank you. bye.

Read full topic

item.title: Illusion-X is back
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

so…let me get this straigth

what you can do:

-take the time to make some horrible gfx

what you cant do

-install and make boards on a smf
-do simple stuff on a server cause your lazy(dont have time )

what you want us to do

-make forums for you
-be staff
-be your pr0 c0d3r

what your willing to offer

-a “bit” of the donations

what you get

-a “lot” of the donations

no thanks…

not being rude at all just pointing out to you what your saying. there will be NO professional developer who will accept a “bit” of pay

Read full topic
